title: The Science of Gift Giving
excerpt: There is a lot of social psychology out there providing information that can inform our everyday lives, and most people are completely unaware of the research. title: The stigma around secondhand gifting is fading away
excerpt: With inflation top of mind for many, surveys show consumers are more eager to buy secondhand items as holiday gifts this year to save money. Are the drivers behind gifting resale items this holiday different from past years?

title: The Importance of Holiday Cards
excerpt: Sending written holiday greetings is not a new tradition. Holiday cards are new, however. Where did this practice come from and why does it persist?
